name: Warmachine
description:
Low effort entry by LFJ Gamestudios - Templar

Control a massive warmachine in a reckless crusade to the holy land.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to control the rotation,

Enter and/or Z to fire mah lazor.

  • Gather resources to fuel your weapons.
  • Defeat unrelenting enemies.

Known Features:

- Some Items get yeeted into orbit. **Working as intended**
